Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
common common is a simply class containing re-usable methods allowing code minimisation for other servlet classes which are part of the student quiz administration website and typically involves extensive http allowing the web pages to render dynamically
DatabaseConnector DatabaseConnector is the class which connects to a mysql database on some network and contains a list of methods to be used by the MIDlet application and the quiz administration panel
home A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
insertquestion A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
login A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
logout A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
ManFunctions ManFunctions (Manual/Manipulation Function) class contains re-usable methods which generally manipulate Strings and also check their content.
MIDletServlet MIDletServlet is a serlvet acting for a MIDlet which connects to this class remotely, communicating via http request/responses The prime purpose for this servlet is to allow the MIDlet to connect to a database through an intermediatory.
submitinsertquestion A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
viewquestions A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
viewquestionsps A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
viewquestionspw A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
viewstatistics A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
viewstatisticsps A servlet which acts as a dynamically created html web page for the quiz administration panel and includes user authentication via created browser cookie values.
